refnamediv.refpurpose: 用用户提供的回调函数做索引检查来计算数组的差集

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.notes;
This function only checks one dimension of a n-dimensional array. Of course you can check deeper dimensions by using, for example, array_diff_uassoc($array1[0], $array2[0], "key_compare_func");.

&reftitle.seealso;
array_diff array_diff_assoc array_udiff array_udiff_assoc array_udiff_uassoc array_intersect array_intersect_assoc array_uintersect array_uintersect_assoc array_uintersect_uassoc
